greeting: What can Kilo Code do for you?

task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
task.shareWithOrganizationDescription: Only members of your organization can access
task.sharePubliclyDescription: Anyone with the link can access
task.connectToCloudDescription: Sign in to Kilo Code Cloud to share tasks

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Task Orchestration
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

modeSelector.title: Modes
modeSelector.description: Specialized personas that tailor Kilo Code's behavior.

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Kilo Code wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Kilo Code wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: Kilo Code wants to read multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: Kilo Code wants to read this file and {{count}} more:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Kilo Code wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEditProtected: Kilo Code wants to edit a protected configuration file:
fileOperations.wantsToApplyBatchChanges: Kilo Code wants to apply changes to multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Kilo Code wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: Kilo Code wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: Kilo Code performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Kilo Code wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Kilo Code wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Kilo Code wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Kilo Code wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Kilo Code viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to view the top level files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code viewed the top level files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Kilo Code wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Kilo Code recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to recursively view all files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Kilo Code wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Kilo Code viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to view source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code viewed source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Kilo Code wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.didSearch: Kilo Code searched this directory for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearchOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code wants to search this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.didSearchOutsideWorkspace: Kilo Code searched this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}:

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: Kilo Code wants to search the codebase for {{query}}:
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: Kilo Code wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}:

commandExecution.commandManagementDescription: Manage command permissions: Click âœ“ to allow auto-execution, âœ— to deny execution. Patterns can be toggled on/off or removed from lists. <settingsLink>View all settings</settingsLink>

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Kilo Code wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Kilo Code wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Kilo Code wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Kilo Code wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}
modes.didSwitchWithReason: Kilo Code switched to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Kilo Code wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Kilo Code wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Kilo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.
autoApprove.selectOptionsFirst: Select at least one option below to enable auto-approval

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ Kilo Code {{version}} Released
announcement.description: Kilo Code {{version}} brings powerful new features and significant improvements to enhance your development workflow.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Message Queueing</bold>: Queue multiple messages while Roo is working, allowing you to continue planning your workflow without interruption.
announcement.feature2: <bold>Custom Slash Commands</bold>: Create personalized slash commands for quick access to frequently used prompts and workflows, with full UI management.
announcement.feature3: <bold>Enhanced Gemini Tools</bold>: New URL context and Google Search grounding capabilities provide Gemini models with real-time web information and enhanced research abilities.
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> ðŸš€

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: Kilo Code wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile isn't compatible with your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Kilo Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Kilo Code has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

autoApprovedCostLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Cost Limit Reached
autoApprovedCostLimitReached.description: Kilo has reached the auto-approved cost limit of ${{count}}. Would you like to reset the cost and proceed with the task?

versionIndicator.ariaLabel: Version {{version}} - Click to view release notes

rooCloudCTA.title: Roo Code Cloud is coming soon!
rooCloudCTA.description: Run Roomote agents in the cloud, access your tasks from anywhere, collaborate with others, and more.
rooCloudCTA.joinWaitlist: Join the waitlist to get early access.

slashCommands.title: Slash Commands
slashCommands.description: Create custom slash commands for quick access to frequently used prompts and workflows. <DocsLink>Docs</DocsLink>

deleteDialog.title: Delete Command
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the command "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
